en: Her cooking is amazing.
Keep your hands off my daughter!
May I ask who you are?
I haven't been busy for these past two days.
My job is strangling rats.

zh: 那是我见过最贵的鞋了。

en: That's right, when you greet him you must strangle him with all your strength. He'll be glad.
zh: 没错，你跟他打招呼的时候一定要使劲掐住他，他会很高兴的。

en: It's inevitable.
It seems as if my daughter is faintly aware that I'm not her real mother.
zh: 我女儿好像隐约感觉到我不是她亲妈了。

en: This is a real Vuitton.
You're not young anymore.
Please understand my position.
I somehow understand your feelings.

en: His affection towards me has decreased.
zh: 他对我没以前那么上心了。

en: Nice timing.
You don't need to worry about wiretapping.

Cosmonauts wear spacesuits.
Just between you and me, that fat ugly witch is on a diet.
zh: 就咱俩私下说，那个又丑又胖的老巫婆在减肥呢。

en: I miss you when you're not here.
zh: 你不在的时候我挺想你的。

en: Do you think that male leggings are cool?
zh: 你觉得男生穿紧身裤帅吗？

en: The walls are bloody.
Do you want to play football with us?
When I was asked by my wife where I was going tomorrow and with whom, I rushed it and ended up giving a confused answer.
zh: 当我老婆问我明天去哪、跟谁去的时候，我一急就说秃噜嘴了，结果解释得乱七八糟的。

en: I bought a commemorative medal on my trip.
zh: 我旅游的时候买了个纪念章。

en: I like horses.
There aren't only nice people in the world.
Senpai, would you buy me some soft ice cream?

We have no second choice.

en: Some sentences don't make sense. So what?

en: Three out of four Americans believe in the existence of paranormal phenomena.
zh: 四分之三的美国人相信有超自然现象。

en: "Thoughtfulness" is a long word in English.

Not everyone is dishonest.

en: That's an old tale.

Whether the medicine will work or not is uncertain.
zh: 这药管不管用还不一定呢。

en: Who the hell do you think you are?

en: The most important thing in a persons life is one's health.

en: I don't make a promise to someone without taking it seriously.

en: The Cold War may have ended, but the fear of war has not yet been removed from the minds of men.

zh: 差旅费加起来要两万日元，真让人郁闷。

en: When you are away, I feel lost.

en: Where they burn books, they will in the end also burn people.

My grandmother is able to fly.

en: Europe has addressed energy issues and climate change far more seriously than the United States has.

Tom was astounded and fascinated by what he saw there.

en: Tom was sad when he discovered that Mary was a gold digger and Mary was sad when she discovered that Tom was poor.

en: Let's all pray together.

This is a lion.

That is essential.

en: I fear for the future of mankind.

It seems silly that you are the one having to quit when it was his fault.

en: Don’t you think it’s strange that although it was his fault, you’re the one quitting?

en: Okay.
You're the tallest one.

Tom and Mary live on a farm and have 16 children.

en: Everyone smiles in the same language.

zh: “那反过来，你喜欢汉字吗？”他问道。

en: So much so that I feel like I'm losing my grasp on the whereabouts.

en: We will never forget about you.

en: I was wrong; forget what I told you.

en: I don't want to speak about her.
Stay calm. You'll have your reward tomorrow.

en: Tatoeba doesn't have all the languages that I need.

Don't hurt me.

en: I don't understand either.

en: Three weeks went by.

en: She speaks not only German and French, but English as well.
zh: 她不仅会说德语和法语，还会说英语。

en: I'm very afraid of snakes.
The two men blamed each other for the crime.
zh: 这两个人互相指责对方犯罪。

en: I'm so worn out.
Wiener sausages are called Frankfurter sausages in Vienna.
zh: 维也纳香肠在维也纳被称为法兰克福香肠。

en: I like this old car more than a new one.
zh: 比起新车，我更喜欢这辆旧车。

en: Copenhagen is the capital of Denmark.
zh: 哥本哈根是丹麦的首都。

en: I treated him like my own son.
zh: 我把他当成亲儿子一样对待。

en: The facts proved that our worries were unnecessary.
zh: 事实证明，我们的担心是多余的。

en: This is very difficult.
This is very hard.
Tom was sleeping.
Tom nodded.
Just as Max predicted, our team lost.
zh: 就像马克斯预测的那样，我们的队伍输了。

en: I married off my daughter.
Tom has a big apartment.
zh: 汤姆有一个很大的公寓。

en: Could you help?
Applause broke out.
If you buy me an ice cream, I'll give you a kiss.
zh: 你要是给我买个冰淇淋，我就亲你一下。

en: We went down by elevator.
Liar!
Tom called in sick.
I should've listened more carefully.
zh: 我当初应该听得再仔细点。

en: Christ is risen!
I need an assistant who speaks Korean.
zh: 我需要一个会说韩语的助手。

en: Tom was thrown from his horse.
Tom was covered with sweat.
Tom is lean and tall.
Who wrote the Bible?
Tom should have discussed it with his parents.
zh: 汤姆本来应该和他父母商量一下的。

en: Mary wore a pale blue dress.
zh: 玛丽穿了一件淡蓝色的裙子。

en: The Titanic hit an iceberg.
zh: 泰坦尼克号撞上了冰山。

en: There won't be nothing much, but please come by my house this evening.
zh: 没什么好招待的，但今晚还是请来我家坐坐吧。

en: What's the minimum wage in your country?
zh: 你们国家的最低工资是多少？

en: My mom wants me to study in Switzerland.
zh: 我妈想让我去瑞士留学。

en: She is strong enough to carry the suitcase.
zh: 她力气够大，搬得动这个行李箱。

en: It's not that easy, huh?
It's not raining.
It isn't raining.
Yes, it's just this.
Did you think that I was joking?
He read a book all morning.
Sit down. You are not allowed to stand up.
My friend went to Canada.
When I was in high school, I woke up at 6 every morning.
zh: 我上高中的时候，每天早上六点起床。

en: Tom and Mary are living together.
Tom is in a lot of trouble.
This food is gluten-free.
I don't think that he is sincere.
I don't think he is sincere.
I don't think that he's honest.
What kinds of plants are you growing in your garden?
zh: 你院子里种了些什么植物？

en: Have you finished dinner?
Everyone inside the building felt the earthquake.
zh: 楼里的人都感觉到地震了。

en: Can I sit here?
The moon has no atmosphere.
Don't worry. Didn't I say that everything would go well?
zh: 别担心，我不是说了会一切顺利吗？

en: Do you think that I'm handsome?
Do you think I'm getting fat?
Do you have an account on twitter?
Tom was arrested for driving while drunk.
zh: 汤姆因为酒后驾车被抓了。

en: Tom was arrested for drunk driving.
Tom didn't know their names.
zh: 汤姆不知道他们的名字。

en: The Earth is blue like an orange.
Nobody died.
Quit staring at me.
How did you get so good at backgammon?
zh: 你西洋双陆棋怎么玩得这么好？

en: Because I do not have children, I can spend more time volunteering than parents can.
zh: 因为我没孩子，所以我比那些有孩子的人有更多时间去做志愿者。

en: Many people think that children spend all their time watching television.
zh: 很多人觉得孩子把所有的时间都花在看电视上了。

en: Many people think that children spend too much time watching television.
zh: 很多人觉得孩子看电视的时间太长了。

en: What's for supper?
She spends many hours at the gym to lose weight.
zh: 她为了减肥在健身房待了好几个小时。

en: This bus is going in a different direction.
zh: 这辆公交车开往的是另一个方向。

en: The farmer seeded the field with wheat.
The farmer scattered the wheat seeds in the field.
zh: 农民把小麦种子撒在了田里。

en: I have a twin sister.
She liked it.
It's made of leather.
I will eat chocolate.
There's no minimum wage here.
zh: 这儿没有最低工资标准。

en: What did you just say?
The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not want.
zh: 耶和华是我的牧者，我必不至缺乏。

en: We climbed to the top.
Tom was shot twice in the chest.
Tom was like a father to Mary.
zh: 汤姆对玛丽来说就像父亲一样。

en: Tom told me that Mary was good at playing the piano, but I didn't really believe him until I heard her play.
zh: 汤姆跟我说玛丽钢琴弹得很好，但我本来还不信，直到亲耳听到她弹。

en: Tom sold his motorcycle to Mary.
zh: 汤姆把他的摩托车卖给玛丽了。

en: If you need my advice, I'd be glad to give it to you.
zh: 要是你需要我的建议，我很乐意帮你出出主意。

en: I went to see Tom, but he wasn't there.
zh: 我去找汤姆了，但他不在。

en: I need to talk to you.
Don't forget your umbrella.
Did you invite Tom to dinner without telling me?
zh: 你是不是没跟我说就偷偷请汤姆吃晚饭了？

en: Tom barely studied for the exam.
zh: 汤姆考试几乎没怎么复习。

en: Tom never saw him again.
This is a yellow rose.
The roads here are congested.
I went on foot.
Tom has two girlfriends.
Many salesmen are smooth talkers, so I think you shouldn't trust them much.
zh: 很多推销员都很能忽悠，我觉得你别太相信他们。

en: The people of this village live in harmony with nature.
zh: 这个村子的人和自然和谐相处。

en: I don't speak Lojban.
I am thirsty.
I love the aroma of freshly brewed coffee.
zh: 我喜欢刚煮好的咖啡的香味。

en: Father, forgive them; for they know not what they do.
zh: 父啊，赦免他们，因为他们所做的，他们不晓得。

en: Mary is in her late twenties.
Tom is playing with his toys.
I am waiting for my friend.
I'm a little confused.
Here is your reward.
This is really weird.
The cheetah is the fastest animal.
zh: 猎豹是跑得最快的动物。

en: A car is faster than a bicycle.
I'm better.
I'd like to hold a staff meeting first thing tomorrow afternoon, so could you reserve the conference room?
zh: 我想明天下午一上班就开个员工会议，你能去订一下会议室吗？

en: Tom came home crying after school.
zh: 汤姆放学后哭着回了家。

en: All the teachers and students we talked to said that Tom is easy to get along with.
zh: 跟我们聊过的老师和同学都说汤姆很好相处。

en: Do you know anything about Tom's childhood?
zh: 你知道汤姆小时候的事吗？

en: Show me the photo.
You're lucky.
You can go.
What room in your house do you spend the most time in?
zh: 你家里待的时间最长的是哪个房间？

en: We met at summer camp.
zh: 我们是在夏令营认识的。

en: Tom started to cry.
Tom likes Mary and Mary likes Tom.
zh: 汤姆喜欢玛丽，玛丽也喜欢汤姆。

en: Tom is depressed because his girlfriend left him.
zh: 汤姆很沮丧，因为他女朋友把他甩了。

en: Tom asked for help.
This milk smells funny.
Thank you for the great meal.
zh: 谢谢你的款待，这顿饭太棒了。

en: Step back.
Put it there.
May I speak to you in private?
It turned out well.
Is there something you want to tell me?
zh: 你是不是有什么话想跟我说？

en: Is it possible that you're wrong?
I'm very disappointed in you.
I'm trying to find the person who owns this guitar.
zh: 我在找这把吉他的主人。

en: I'm not sure what's wrong.
I wonder why Tom didn't call me.
zh: 我纳闷汤姆怎么没给我打电话。

en: I was living in Boston a few years ago.
I should go with you.
I love this song.
I have something to show you.
I guess Tom was right.
I don't want to see you again.
How long did Tom work here?
zh: 汤姆在这儿工作了多久？

en: How did you know we were here?
zh: 你怎么知道我们在这儿？

en: Go find Tom.
Everybody hates Tom.
Don't try to blame this all on me.
zh: 别想把这事儿全赖在我头上。

en: Do you happen to have any photographs of Tom?
zh: 你手里正好有汤姆的照片吗？

en: Call me.
Are you doing anything special for New Year's Eve?
zh: 跨年夜你有什么特别的安排吗？

en: Are there any questions?
Like father like son.
I have 1,500 head of cattle.
Tom speaks French pretty well.
Tom has never been sick.
Which cup is yours?
Let me try.
Just relax.
Tom really loves animals.
He is sprawled out on the sofa.
We know.
They are reading her book.
I've already read this book.
This book is very heavy.
I love you more than anything.
Living is growing old, nothing more.
zh: 活着就是变老，仅此而已。

en: Tom dyed his hair.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.
Tom can hold his breath for five minutes.
We're in trouble.
Tom is a good kisser.
I always go to school on foot.
There are lots of things I want to talk about.
Tom likes making paper aeroplanes.
I've been waiting for her for an hour.
Tom dyed his hair black.
Are there bigger carrots?
zh: 有大一点儿的胡萝卜吗？

en: What are you going to do after graduating from college?
zh: 大学毕业后你打算做什么？

en: You must take the medicine!
Please! Don't open the window.
Please! Please don't skip class.
Your name sounds familiar to me.
zh: 你的名字听起来很耳熟。

en: She dreamed of becoming a nurse.
